text: Since you like this silly Image of me 😂
Meeting you on Whisper and now we are already 8 months together, it's crazy how fast time flies 😍
The name call weirdo always makes me laugh 😂
The way you are always ther to help everyone, including my dad! I love that about you 😍
IF YOU SEE THIS, This is a coupon for selecting a shirt for me, I'll buy it and wear it for you 😍
IF YOU SEE THIS, You get a 10-minute voice note of me saying sweet nothings 🎧💖
IF YOU SEE THIS, You get to pick the next movie we watch together — no veto from me! 🍿
IF YOU SEE THIS, Send me a photo and I’ll turn it into a little drawing just for you ✍️🎁
IF YOU SEE THIS, You can demand one random selfie from me right now 🤳💌
IF YOU SEE THIS, You get a custom playlist made by me, based on your current mood 🎶
IF YOU SEE THIS, I owe you one cute hand-written love letter, scanned and sent with kisses 💌💋
IF YOU SEE THIS, You can make me say anything (cute/funny/silly) and I’ll send it as a voice note 🎤😂
IF YOU SEE THIS, You get a personalized poem written just for you 📝✨
IF YOU SEE THIS, You can plan one virtual date and I’ll say yes to everything (almost 😛)
